description: This file defines the `OrderService` class which provides methods to place, list, and retrieve orders within a food delivery application. It interacts with an external API via an API client and models related to orders and cart items.

classes.name: OrderService
classes.description: A service class providing methods to interact with order-related API endpoints, including placing new orders, listing all orders, and fetching details of a specific order.

methods.name: placeOrder
methods.description: Creates a new order with the provided list of cart items by sending a POST request to the API. Returns the created Order object.

methods.name: listOrders
methods.description: Retrieves a list of all orders by sending a GET request to the API. Returns a list of Order objects.

methods.name: getOrder
methods.description: Fetches details of a specific order by its ID via a GET request. Returns the Order object.
